title: Saviors
description: Every move matters.The town of Patience is home to the privileged, the elite, and the ruthless. And Juliet will have to become all of those things if she wants to solve the family mystery once and for all.Lucky for her, she doesnâ€™t have to work alone.Some pawns deserved to be saved.Saviors is the final book in a series of full-length reverse harem high school bully romances. Some scenes portray subject matter that may be difficult for some readers. Enjoy at your own risk!
author: Cassie  James
